Following the input, list two ways companies can use facial recognition technology to enhance customer experience.
Facial Recognition

Companies can utilize facial recognition technology in several ways to enhance customer experience. Here are two examples:

1. **Personalized Customer Service**: By using facial recognition, companies can identify returning customers and access their purchase history and preferences in real-time. This allows businesses to offer personalized recommendations and promotions tailored to individual customer needs, thereby improving customer satisfaction and building loyalty.

2. **Streamlined Check-In and Payment Processes**: In sectors like hospitality and retail, facial recognition can expedite check-in and payment processes. For instance, hotels can use facial recognition to allow guests to check in seamlessly without waiting in long lines, and retail stores can enable customers to make secure, contactless payments using facial recognition, enhancing convenience and speed during transactions.
